survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Flexibility Policies Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with current workplace flexibility policies, including remote work, flexible hours, and other related arrangements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your organization's current workplace flexibility policies?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your organization's current workplace flexibility policies?

questions.question_text: Which type of workplace flexibility arrangements do you currently utilize? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all utilized arrangements. Ensure the options are clear and comprehensive.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance workplace flexibility in your organization?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance workplace flexibility in your organization?

questions.question_text: How has workplace flexibility impacted your productivity?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your organization's workplace flexibility policies to others in your industry?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/unsure question to gauge advocacy. Ensure the options are straightforward.
